metadata.title: CVE-2020-13987 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Contiki through 3.0. An Out-of-Bounds Read vulnerability exists in the uIP TCP/IP Stack component when calculating the checksums for IP packets in upper_layer_chksum in net/ipv4/uip.c.

advisory.discovered_by: Jos Wetzels, Stanislav Dashevskyi, and Amine Amri

notes.note: sbeattie> aka FSCT-2020-0009 issue in embedded copy of uIP mdeslaur> per upstream "iscsiuio only uses uip for network "services", such as DHCP, ARP, etc, and not for normal TCP/IP communications"

criterions.comment: open-iscsi package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-1ubuntu1').
